name: Grid 9 - Puzzle Game
description:
Let's play amazing addictive game. It's endless puzzle game with colourful user interface.

How to play?
=========
- You need drag and drop block on grid and completed line horizontal and vertical.
- Create your best score.

Features:
=======
- Mind relax game play.
- Endless game mode.
- Two colour theme.
- Challenge your friends.

So are you ready for beat me.
